Airport.english: 1. The airport is crowded with travelers.
Airport.italian: L'aeroporto è affollato di viaggiatori.
Airport.spanish: El aeropuerto está lleno de viajeros.
Airport.german: Der Flughafen ist voller Reisender.

Airport.english: 2. We need to check in for our flight.
Airport.italian: Dobbiamo fare il check-in per il nostro volo.
Airport.spanish: Tenemos que hacer el check-in para nuestro vuelo.
Airport.german: Wir müssen für unseren Flug einchecken.

Airport.english: 3. The security line is moving slowly.
Airport.italian: La fila della sicurezza si muove lentamente.
Airport.spanish: La fila de seguridad se mueve lentamente.
Airport.german: Die Sicherheitsschlange bewegt sich langsam.

Airport.english: 4. I have a layover in Madrid.
Airport.italian: Ho una sosta a Madrid.
Airport.spanish: Tengo una escala en Madrid.
Airport.german: Ich habe einen Zwischenstopp in Madrid.

Airport.english: 5. The flight has been delayed due to bad weather.
Airport.italian: Il volo è stato ritardato a causa del maltempo.
Airport.spanish: El vuelo se ha retrasado debido al mal tiempo.
Airport.german: Der Flug wurde aufgrund des schlechten Wetters verspätet.

Airport.english: 6. Do you have any liquids in your carry-on bag?
Airport.italian: Hai dei liquidi nel tuo bagaglio a mano?
Airport.spanish: ¿Tienes líquidos en tu equipaje de mano?
Airport.german: Haben Sie Flüssigkeiten in Ihrem Handgepäck?

Airport.english: 7. The airport shuttle will take you to the terminal.
Airport.italian: La navetta dell'aeroporto ti porterà al terminal.
Airport.spanish: El autobús del aeropuerto te llevará a la terminal.
Airport.german: Der Flughafen-Shuttle bringt Sie zum Terminal.

Airport.english: 8. I need to find the baggage claim area.
Airport.italian: Devo trovare l'area ritiro bagagli.
Airport.spanish: Necesito encontrar el área de reclamo de equipaje.
Airport.german: Ich muss den Gepäckausgabe-Bereich finden.

Airport.english: 9. We are boarding the plane now.
Airport.italian: Stiamo imbarcando sull'aereo ora.
Airport.spanish: Estamos abordando el avión ahora.
Airport.german: Wir steigen jetzt ins Flugzeug ein.

Airport.english: 10. Can I have a window seat, please?
Airport.italian: Posso avere un posto vicino al finestrino, per favore?
Airport.spanish: ¿Puedo tener un asiento junto a la ventana, por favor?
Airport.german: Kann ich bitte einen Fensterplatz haben?

Airport.english: 11. The flight attendant is serving drinks.
Airport.italian: L'assistente di volo sta servendo le bevande.
Airport.spanish: La azafata está sirviendo bebidas.
Airport.german: Die Flugbegleiterin serviert Getränke.

Airport.english: 12. We are experiencing some turbulence.
Airport.italian: Stiamo attraversando delle turbolenze.
Airport.spanish: Estamos experimentando turbulencia.
Airport.german: Wir haben etwas Turbulenzen.

Airport.english: 13. I need to go through customs and immigration.
Airport.italian: Devo passare per la dogana e l'immigrazione.
Airport.spanish: Necesito pasar por aduanas e inmigración.
Airport.german: Ich muss durch den Zoll und die Einwanderung.

Airport.english: 14. The airport offers free Wi-Fi for passengers.
Airport.italian: L'aeroporto offre Wi-Fi gratuito per i passeggeri.
Airport.spanish: El aeropuerto ofrece Wi-Fi gratuito para los pasajeros.
Airport.german: Der Flughafen bietet kostenloses WLAN für Passagiere an.

Airport.english: 15. I have a connecting flight to catch.
Airport.italian: Devo prendere un volo di coincidenza.
Airport.spanish: Tengo que tomar un vuelo de conexión.
Airport.german: Ich habe einen Anschlussflug zu erreichen.

Airport.english: 16. The duty-free shop has a wide selection of perfumes.
Airport.italian: Il negozio duty-free ha una vasta selezione di profumi.
Airport.spanish: La tienda libre de impuestos tiene una amplia selección de perfumes.
Airport.german: Der Duty-Free-Shop bietet eine große Auswahl an Parfüms.

Airport.english: 17. The airport has a lost and found office.
Airport.italian: L'aeroporto ha un ufficio oggetti smarriti.
Airport.spanish: El aeropuerto tiene una oficina de objetos perdidos.
Airport.german: Der Flughafen hat ein Fundbüro.

Airport.english: 18. The pilot announced that we are landing soon.
Airport.italian: Il pilota ha annunciato che stiamo per atterrare.
Airport.spanish: El piloto anunció que estamos a punto de aterrizar.
Airport.german: Der Pilot hat angekündigt, dass wir bald landen.

Airport.english: 19. I need to go through the security checkpoint.
Airport.italian: Devo passare attraverso il controllo di sicurezza.
Airport.spanish: Necesito pasar por el punto de control de seguridad.
Airport.german: Ich muss durch die Sicherheitskontrolle.

Airport.english: 20. The airport has a currency exchange office.
Airport.italian: L'aeroporto ha un ufficio di cambio valuta.
Airport.spanish: El aeropuerto tiene una oficina de cambio de divisas.
Airport.german: Der Flughafen hat eine Wechselstube.
